TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 类的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建委托时，标识要处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify a method to handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示可以用作的处理程序方法。The following code example shows a method that can be used as a handler for . 此示例摘自一个较大示例类。This example is part of a larger sample for the class. [!code-cpp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CPP/fibonacciform.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/CS/fibonacciform.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BackgroundWorker/VB/fibonacciform.vb#6)]
